<script id="gu">
    // ************* POLYFILLS *************
    // Mostly handled by polyfill.io below. These are needed for inline JS though, so cannot rely on pf.io

    // It's faster to pass arguments in setTimeout than to use an anon function, but IE <10 can't do that.
    // Used by RAF polyfill.
    
// Polyfill setTimeout args: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WindowTimers.setTimeout.
/*@cc_on
    @if (@_jscript_version <= 9)
(function(f){
    window.setTimeout = f(window.setTimeout);
    window.setInterval = f(window.setInterval);
})(function(f){return function(c,t){var a=[].slice.call(arguments,2);return f(function(){c.apply(this,a)},t)}});
    @end
@*/


    // Pollyfill requestAnimationFrame
    (function(window){var lastTime,vendors;if(!window.requestAnimationFrame){lastTime=0;vendors=["ms","moz","webkit","o"];for(var x=0;x<vendors.length&&!window.requestAnimationFrame;++x){window.requestAnimationFrame=window[vendors[x]+"RequestAnimationFrame"];window.cancelAnimationFrame=window[vendors[x]+"CancelAnimationFrame"]||window[vendors[x]+"CancelRequestAnimationFrame"]}window.requestAnimationFrame=function(callback,element){var currTime=(new Date).getTime();var timeToCall=Math.max(0,16-(currTime-
lastTime));var id=window.setTimeout(function(){callback(currTime+timeToCall)},timeToCall);lastTime=currTime+timeToCall;return id}}if(!window.cancelAnimationFrame)window.cancelAnimationFrame=function(id){clearTimeout(id)}})(window);

    // Polyfill details
    (function(window,document){var weShouldPolyfill=!("open"in document.createElement("details"));function toggleDetailsState(details){if(details.hasAttribute("open"))details.removeAttribute("open");else details.setAttribute("open","open")}function handleEvent(event){var targetNode=event.target;while(targetNode.nodeName.toLowerCase()!=="summary"&&targetNode!==document)targetNode=targetNode.parentNode;if(targetNode.nodeName.toLowerCase()==="summary")toggleDetailsState(targetNode.parentNode)}function bindEvents(){document.addEventListener("click",
handleEvent,true);document.addEventListener("keypress",function(event){if(event.key&&(event.key===" "||event.key==="Enter"))handleEvent(event);else if(event.keyCode===32||event.keyCode===13)handleEvent(event)},true)}function appendCss(){if(document.querySelector("#details-polyfill-css")===null){var style=document.createElement("style");style.id="details-polyfill-css";style.textContent="details:not([open]) \x3e *:not(summary) {display: none;}";document.head.insertBefore(style,document.head.firstChild)}}
if(weShouldPolyfill){bindEvents();appendCss()}})(window,document);


    // ************* RENDER-CRITICAL BLOCKING JS *************


    // determine whether to run enhanced JS
    (function(window){var location=window.location;var hash=location.hash;var navigator=window.navigator;var platform=navigator.platform;var isFront=true;var enhancedKey="gu.prefs.enhanced";var preferEnhanced;try{preferEnhanced=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(enhancedKey)).value}catch(e){preferEnhanced=null}function mustEnhance(){if(hash==="#enhanced"||hash==="#"+enhancedKey+"\x3dtrue")return true;if(preferEnhanced)return true;return false}function mustNotEnhance(){return hash==="#standard"||hash==="#"+
enhancedKey+"\x3dfalse"}function couldEnhance(){return preferEnhanced!==false}function weWantToEnhance(){if(isOlderIOSDevice())return false;if(isFront)return!isIpad();return true}function isOlderIOSDevice(){return/.*(iPhone|iPad|iPod; CPU) OS ([34567])_\d+.*/.test(navigator.userAgent)}function isIpad(){return platform==="iPad"}window.shouldEnhance=mustNotEnhance()?false:mustEnhance()?true:couldEnhance()&&weWantToEnhance()})(window);

    // page config
    
var isModernBrowser =
    "querySelector" in document
    && "addEventListener" in window
    && "localStorage" in window
    && "sessionStorage" in window
    && "bind" in Function
    && (
        ("XMLHttpRequest" in window && "withCredentials" in new XMLHttpRequest())
        || "XDomainRequest" in window
    );

    (function(documentElement,window,navigator){var docClass=documentElement.className;var testCssSupportForPropertyAndValue=function(supportsSupports){return supportsSupports?nativeCSSSupports:shimCSSSupports()}("CSS"in window&&"supports"in window.CSS);function nativeCSSSupports(prop,value){return window.CSS.supports(prop,value)}function shimCSSSupports(){var cssToDOMRegExp=/([a-z])-([a-z])/g;var testElem=document.createElement("test");function cssToDOM(name){return name.replace(cssToDOMRegExp,cssToDOMReplacer).replace(/^-/,
"")}function cssToDOMReplacer(str,m1,m2){return m1+m2.toUpperCase()}return function(prop,value){try{prop=cssToDOM(prop);var originalValue=testElem.style[prop];if(originalValue===undefined)return false;if(originalValue===value)return true;testElem.style[prop]=value;return testElem.style[prop]!==originalValue}catch(e){return false}}}function testAndAddClass(tests){docClass+=" "+tests.map(function(test){return(test.props.some(function(prop){return test.values.some(function(value){return testCssSupportForPropertyAndValue(prop,
value)})})?"has-":"has-no-")+test.feature}).join(" ")}function getCookieValue(name){var val=document.cookie.match("(^|;)\\s*"+name+"\\s*\x3d\\s*([^;]+)");return val?val.pop():undefined}function isRecentContributor(){var value=getCookieValue("gu.contributions.contrib-timestamp");if(!value)return false;var now=(new Date).getTime();var lastContribution=(new Date(value)).getTime();var diffDays=Math.ceil((now-lastContribution)/(1E3*3600*24));return diffDays<=180}function shouldHideSupportMessaging(){return getCookieValue("gu_hide_support_messaging")===
"true"}function forcePercentagePadding(){var firefoxMatch=navigator.userAgent.match(/Firefox\/([0-9]+)\./)||[];if(firefoxMatch.length===2&&parseInt(firefoxMatch[1],10)<54)return true;return false}if(!!document.createElementNS&&!!document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","svg").createSVGRect)docClass+=" svg";else docClass+=" no-svg";testAndAddClass([{feature:"flex",props:["flex","-ms-flex","-webkit-flex","-moz-box-flex","-webkit-box-flex"],values:["inherit"]},{feature:"flex-wrap",props:["flex-wrap",
"-ms-flex-wrap","-webkit-flex-wrap"],values:["inherit"]},{feature:"fixed",props:["position"],values:["fixed"]},{feature:"sticky",props:["position"],values:["sticky","-webkit-sticky"]}]);if(window.guardian.isEnhanced)docClass=docClass.replace(/\bis-not-modern\b/g,"is-modern");if(window.location.hash!=="#no-kern")docClass+=" should-kern";var baseFontSize=null;if("getComputedStyle"in window)baseFontSize=window.getComputedStyle(documentElement).getPropertyValue("font-size");if(baseFontSize&&parseInt(baseFontSize,
10)!==16)documentElement.style.fontSize=baseFontSize;if(shouldHideSupportMessaging())docClass+=" hide-support-messaging";if(isRecentContributor())docClass+=" is-recent-contributor";if(forcePercentagePadding())docClass+=" force-percentage-padding";documentElement.className=docClass.replace(/\bjs-off\b/g,"js-on")})(document.documentElement,window,navigator);

    <div class="l-side-margins"> 
 <div class="facia-page" data-link-name="Front | /uk" role="main"> 
  <h1 class="u-h">News, sport and opinion from the Guardian's UK edition</h1> 
  <section id="palette-styles-new-do-not-delete" class="fc-container fc-container--first fc-container--thrasher flashing-image js-container--first " data-link-name="container-1 | palette-styles-new-do-not-delete" data-id="ba744122-6c99-417f-8ddd-5a5905eb4928" data-component="palette-styles-new-do-not-delete" aria-expanded="true"> 
   <div class="fc-container__inner"> 
    <header class="fc-container__header
                js-container__header
                "> 
     <div class="fc-container__header__title"> 
      <h2 tabindex="0">Palette styles new do not delete</h2> 
     </div> 
    </header> 
    <div class="fc-container--rolled-up-hide fc-container__body" data-title="Palette styles new do not delete" data-id="ba744122-6c99-417f-8ddd-5a5905eb4928" id="container-ba744122-6c99-417f-8ddd-5a5905eb4928"> 
     <div class="fc-slice-wrapper"> 
      <ul class="u-unstyled l-row  l-row--cols-1 fc-slice fc-slice--mf"> 
       <li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link"> 
        <div class="facia-snap facia-snap--default facia-snap-embed fc-item fc-item--force-image-upgrade fc-item--has-no-image fc-item--pillar-news fc-item--type-article js-fc-item js-snap fc-item--fluid-mobile fc-item--fluid-tablet " data-link-name="external | group-0 | card-@1" data-item-visibility="all" data-test-id="facia-card" data-id="snap/1648722655221" data-snap-type="interactive" data-snap-uri="https://content.guardianapis.com/atom/interactive/interactives/2022/03/29/fronts-container-colours/default"> 
         <style>section#palette-styles-do-not-delete,section#palette-styles-new-do-not-delete{height:0;overflow:hidden;margin:0;padding:0}.fc-container--long-running-palette+.fc-container__mpu--mobile{background-color:#939a9d;margin-top:-12px;padding-bottom:20px}.interactive-atom{margin:0;padding:0}section:not(.fc-container--has-palette).fc-container--story-package .fc-item--is-dynamic-card .fc-item__content--above{padding-left:.3125rem;padding-right:.3125rem}section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item--three-quarters-tall-tablet .fc-item__header{padding-left:5px}section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item[class*=fc-item--pillar-][class*=fc-item--standard-] .fc-item__title,section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-slice-wrapper+.fc-slice-wrapper .fc-slice--q-q-q-q .fc-item[class*=fc-item--pillar-][class*=fc-item--standard-] .fc-item__title{background-image:none}section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-item__headline,section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item.fc-item--live .fc-item__headline{color:#fff;font-weight:900}section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-item__meta-wrapper>.fc-item__meta,section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-item__standfirst-wrapper>.fc-item__meta{color:#fff;font-weight:400}section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-item__link:visited,section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-sublink .fc-sublink__link,section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-sublink .fc-sublink__link:visited,section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-sublink__title{color:#fff}section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-trail__count--commentcount .inline-icon,section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item .fc-trail__count--commentcount .inline-icon svg{fill:#fff}section.fc-container--has-palette .fc-item             <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/live/2022/nov/23/scottish-independence-referendum-supreme-court-scotland-pmqs-sunak-starmer-uk-politics-live-latest-news" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker fc-item__kicker--breaking-news"><span class="live-pulse-icon flashing-image"></span>Live</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Downing Street rejects SNP’s claim next general election in Scotland is a de facto independence referendum</span></span> </a></h3>

           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2022/nov/23/russia-ukraine-war-live-newborn-killed-in-russian-strike-on-hospital-says-zaporizhzhia-governor" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker fc-item__kicker--breaking-news"><span class="live-pulse-icon flashing-image"></span>Live</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Russia-Ukraine war: ‘massive’ blackout reported in Moldova and Kyiv’s critical infrastructure hit after new Russian strikes</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             Moldova’s deputy PM says hit to Ukraine’s energy infrastructure has caused power outages; several dead in Kyiv after Russian rocket strikes
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2022/nov/23/russia-ukraine-war-live-newborn-killed-in-russian-strike-on-hospital-says-zaporizhzhia-governor" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">Russia-Ukraine war: ‘massive’ blackout reported in Moldova and Kyiv’s critical infrastructure hit after new Russian strikes</a> 
         </div>

           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/live/2022/nov/23/germany-v-japan-world-cup-2022-live" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker fc-item__kicker--breaking-news"><span class="live-pulse-icon flashing-image"></span>Live</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Germany v Japan: World Cup 2022</span></span> </a></h3>

             <div class="fc-item__header">

  <section id="spotlight" class="fc-container fc-container--will-have-toggle js-container--toggle " data-link-name="container-4 | spotlight" data-id="c686a32a-6536-458a-8409-44e6a9684216" data-component="spotlight" aria-expanded="true"> 
   <div class="fc-container__inner"> 
    <header class="fc-container__header
                js-container__header
                ">

           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2022/nov/23/tidal-stream-energy-costs-ebb-reliability-flows" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Renewable energy</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">How tide has turned on UK tidal stream energy as costs ebb and reliability flows</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             Investors are seeing rising potential in tidal power as turbines become more powerful and easier to deploy
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2022/nov/23/tidal-stream-energy-costs-ebb-reliability-flows" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">How tide has turned on UK tidal stream energy as costs ebb and reliability flows</a>

          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/music/2022/nov/23/wilko-johnson-obituary" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Obituary</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Wilko Johnson (1947 - 2022)</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             Musician with Dr Feelgood whose stark chords and pin-sharp riffs made him one of the most distinctive of British rock guitarists
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/music/2022/nov/23/wilko-johnson-obituary" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">Wilko Johnson (1947 - 2022)</a> 
         </div>

            <div class="fc-item__content "> 
             <div class="fc-item__header"> 
              <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2022/nov/23/intergenerational-friendship-loneliness" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Intergenerational friendships</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">'I’m young. They’re old. Yet our friendship means the world to me'</span></span> </a></h3> 
             </div> 
             <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
              <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
               Intergenerational friendships can anchor a person in their local community, help them access new world views – and be fun
              </div> 
              <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2022/nov/23/intergenerational-friendship-loneliness" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">'I’m young. They’re old. Yet our friendship means the world to me'</a> 
           </div> 
          </div> </li>

            <div class="fc-item__content "> 
             <div class="fc-item__header"> 
              <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/tv-and-radio/2022/nov/23/ancient-apocalypse-is-the-most-dangerous-show-on-netflix" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Television</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Ancient Apocalypse is the most dangerous show on Netflix</span></span> </a></h3> 
              <div class="fc-item__byline">
               Stuart Heritage
              </div> 
             </div>

              <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/tv-and-radio/2022/nov/23/blood-sex-royalty-review-a-terrific-peek-at-henry-viii-and-anne-boleyns-sexiest-bits" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Blood, Sex &amp; Royalty review</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">A terrific peek at Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn’s sexiest bits</span></span> </a></h3>

               <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden">

                </svg> </span> 
               <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden"> 
                <svg width="14" height="13" viewbox="0 0 14 13" class="star__item__svg star__item--golden__svg inline-star__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
                 <path d="M0 5.2 3.7 8l-1.4 4.6.5.4 3.7-2.8 3.7 2.8.5-.4L9.3 8 13 5.2l-.2-.6H8.2L6.8 0h-.6L4.8 4.6H.2l-.2.6z" /> 
                </svg> </span> 
               <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden"> 
                <svg width="14" height="13" viewbox="0 0 14 13" class="star__item__svg star__item--golden__svg inline-star__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
                 <path d="M0 5.2 3.7 8l-1.4 4.6.5.4 3.7-2.8 3.7 2.8.5-.4L9.3 8 13 5.2l-.2-.6H8.2L6.8 0h-.6L4.8 4.6H.2l-.2.6z" /> 
                </svg> </span> 
               <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--grey"> 
                <svg width="14" height="13" viewbox="0 0 14 13" class="star__item__svg star__item--grey__svg inline-star__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
                 <path d="M0 5.2 3.7 8l-1.4 4.6.5.4 3.7-2.8 3.7 2.8.5-.4L9.3 8 13 5.2l-.2-.6H8.2L6.8 0h-.6L4.8 4.6H.2l-.2.6z" /> 
                </svg> </span> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
              <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/tv-and-radio/2022/nov/23/blood-sex-royalty-review-a-terrific-peek-at-henry-viii-and-anne-boleyns-sexiest-bits" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">A terrific peek at Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn’s sexiest bits</a> 
           </div> 
          </div> </li> 
        </ul> </li> 
      </ul> 
     </div> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
  </section>

              <h3 class="fc-item__title fc-item__title--quoted"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2022/nov/23/isabella-bird-explorer-history-heroine-tv-ruby-wax" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="inline-garnett-quote inline-icon ">

             <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
              <div class="fc-item__standfirst">

             </div>

            <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2022/nov/23/isabella-bird-explorer-history-heroine-tv-ruby-wax" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">Why Isabella Bird, the Victorian explorer forgotten by history, became my heroine</a>

          </div> </li> 
         <li class="fc-slice__item l-list__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link">

            <div class="fc-item__content "> 
             <div class="fc-item__header"> 
              <h3 class="fc-item__title fc-item__title--quoted"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2022/nov/23/the-massacre-at-club-q-didnt-happen-in-a-vacuum-there-has-been-a-dangerous-escalation-in-hateful-anti-lgbt-rhetoric" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="inline-garnett-quote inline-icon "> 
                  <svg width="70" height="49" viewbox="0 0 35 25" class="inline-garnett-quote__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
                   <path d="M69.587.9c-1.842 15.556-3.89 31.316-4.708 48.1H37.043c3.07-16.784 8.391-32.544 17.602-48.1h14.942zM32.949.9c-2.047 15.556-4.094 31.316-4.912 48.1H.2C3.066 32.216 8.592 16.456 17.598.9h15.35z" /> 
                  </svg> </span> <span class="js-headline-text">The massacre at Club Q didn’t happen in a vacuum. There has been a dangerous escalation in hateful anti-LGBT rhetoric</span></span> </a></h3> 
              <div class="fc-item__byline">
               Arwa Mahdawi
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
              <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
               The most shocking thing about what happened is that it felt so inevitable, writes Arwa Mahdawi
              </div> 
              <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
            <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2022/nov/23/the-massacre-at-club-q-didnt-happen-in-a-vacuum-there-has-been-a-dangerous-escalation-in-hateful-anti-lgbt-rhetoric" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">The massacre at Club Q didn’t happen in a vacuum. There has been a dangerous escalation in hateful anti-LGBT rhetoric</a> 
           </div>

               <!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]--> 
               <img loading="auto" class="responsive-img" alt="" src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/50baa1847d2674389e68d1c234c4ed2befe5fa1f/0_144_3152_1891/master/3152.jpg?width=300&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=5cfdac60cfed8c938a8cb427cb13e445"> 
              </picture> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__content "> 
             <div class="fc-item__header"> 
              <h3 class="fc-item__title fc-item__title--quoted"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2022/nov/22/keir-starmer-is-the-man-with-a-plan-but-it-doesnt-involve-talking-about-brexit" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="inline-garnett-quote inline-icon "> 
                  <svg width="70" height="49" viewbox="0 0 35 25" class="inline-garnett-quote__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
                   <path d="M69.587.9c-1.842 15.556-3.89 31.316-4.708 48.1H37.043c3.07-16.784 8.391-32.544 17.602-48.1h14.942zM32.949.9c-2.047 15.556-4.094 31.316-4.912 48.1H.2C3.066 32.216 8.592 16.456 17.598.9h15.35z" /> 
                  </svg> </span> <span class="js-headline-text">Keir Starmer is the man with a plan, but it doesn’t involve talking about Brexit</span></span> </a></h3> 
              <div class="fc-item__byline">
               John Crace
              </div> 
             </div> 
             <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
              <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
              </div> 
             </div> 
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
            <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2022/nov/22/keir-starmer-is-the-man-with-a-plan-but-it-doesnt-involve-talking-about-brexit" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">Keir Starmer is the man with a plan, but it doesn’t involve talking about Brexit</a> 
           </div> 
          </div> </li> 
        </ul> </li> 
      </ul> 
     </div>

  <section id="world-cup-2022" class="fc-container fc-container--event-alt-palette fc-container--has-palette fc-container--has-show-more fc-container--will-have-toggle js-container--toggle " data-link-name="container-7 | world-cup-2022" data-id="6b9dbb4b-dad6-4bfa-bc77-d6911bbac71c" data-component="world-cup-2022" aria-expanded="true">

                 fc-container__header--is-badged

     <div class="fc-container__header__title"> 
      <a data-link-name="section heading" href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/world-cup-2022"> 
       <div class="badge-slot"> 
        <img class="badge-slot__img" src="https://assets.guim.co.uk/images/badges/3ef8fe0c2b804b86e65e9823e9ebc082/world-cup-2022.svg" alt=""> 
       </div> <h2 id="container-header-6b9dbb4b-dad6-4bfa-bc77-d6911bbac71c" class="fc-container__title__text">World Cup 2022</h2> </a> 
     </div> 
    </header> 
    <div class="fc-container--rolled-up-hide fc-container__body fc-show-more--hidden js-container--fc-show-more" data-title="World Cup 2022" data-id="6b9dbb4b-dad6-4bfa-bc77-d6911bbac71c" id="container-6b9dbb4b-dad6-4bfa-bc77-d6911bbac71c"> 
     <div class="fc-slice-wrapper"> 
      <ul class="u-unstyled l-row  l-row--cols-4 fc-slice fc-slice--qqq-q"> 
       <li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-3 u-faux-block-link"> 
        <div class="fc-item fc-item--has-image fc-item--has-sublinks-3 fc-item--is-boosted fc-item--pillar-sport fc-item--type-article js-fc-item fc-item--standard-mobile fc-item--three-quarters-tablet js-snappable" data-link-name="news | group-2+ | card-@1" data-item-visibility="all" data-test-id="facia-card" data-id="football/2022/nov/23/germany-cover-mouths-wear-rainbows-on-kit-in-world-cup-protest-fifa-qatar-onelove" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/mmt6e"> 
         <div class="fc-item__container"> 
          <div class="fc-item__media-wrapper"> 
           <div class="fc-item__image-container u-responsive-ratio "> 
            <picture> 
             <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]--> 
             <source media="(min-width: 980px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.25), (min-width: 980px) and (min-resolution: 120dpi)" sizes="460px" srcset="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/bc2d55007cade13f489168621ec49bdd14ca0e2a/170_0_3224_1935/master/3224.jpg?width=460&amp;quality=45&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;dpr=2&amp;s=2ab305b7aec4d52e84b1f1a4c7ed2067 920w">

             <source media="(min-width: 0px)" sizes="95vw" srcset="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/bc2d55007cade13f489168621ec49bdd14ca0e2a/170_0_3224_1935/master/3224.jpg?width=460&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=27862abebeb1b72806d1cc1892fb0b5a 460w, https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/bc2d55007cade13f489168621ec49bdd14ca0e2a/170_0_3224_1935/master/3224.jpg?width=340&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=2146cd48a232917dd9f9f179a1ec7d8d 340w, https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/bc2d55007cade13f489168621ec49bdd14ca0e2a/170_0_3224_1935/master/3224.jpg?width=445&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=9dc5f1045c3b959ac1a3152b3afe0809 445w, https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/bc2d55007cade13f489168621ec49bdd14ca0e2a/170_0_3224_1935/master/3224.jpg?width=605&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=c699a54150060d00346a5d9eaa996a0e 605w"> 
             <!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]--> 
             <img loading="auto" class="responsive-img" alt="" src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/bc2d55007cade13f489168621ec49bdd14ca0e2a/170_0_3224_1935/master/3224.jpg?width=300&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=00eb17dcfcde078e2bae817471e1f35a"> 
            </picture> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2022/nov/23/germany-cover-mouths-wear-rainbows-on-kit-in-world-cup-protest-fifa-qatar-onelove" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Germany</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Players cover mouths and wear rainbows on kit in protest</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             Germany’s players placed hands over their mouths and wore rainbow stripes on their warm-up tops and boots in a powerful statement of defiance against Fifa
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__footer--vertical" aria-hidden="true"> 
            <ul class="fc-sublinks u-unstyled u-faux-block-link__promote">

      <ul class="u-unstyled l-row  l-row--cols-4 fc-slice fc-slice--h14-q-q"> 
       <li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-2"> 
        <ul class="u-unstyled l-list l-list--columns-2 l-list--rows-1">

            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2022/nov/23/potential-sale-of-manchester-united-could-inspire-overhaul-of-old-trafford" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Football</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Potential Manchester United sale could inspire Old Trafford overhaul</span></span> </a></h3>

          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/sport/2022/nov/23/rehan-ahmed-england-youngest-ever-mens-test-cricketer" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Cricket</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Ahmed set to become England’s youngest men’s Test player</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             The 18-year-old leg-spinner Rehan Ahmed could become England’s youngest ever men’s Test cricketer after being added to the squad to tour Pakistan
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div>

            </ul> 
           </div> 
          </div>

            <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/sport/blog/2022/nov/22/verstappen-and-red-bull-unstoppable-in-year-of-george-russells-breakthrough" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">Verstappen and Red Bull leave rivals stuck in reverse</a> 
           </div> 
          </div> </li> 
        </ul> </li> 
       <li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 fc-slice__item--mpu-candidate">  
        <div id="dfp-ad--inline2" class="js-ad-slot ad-slot ad-slot--inline2 ad-slot--container-inline hide-until-tablet" data-link-name="ad slot inline2" data-name="inline2" aria-hidden="true"> 
        </div> </li> 
      </ul> 
     </div> 
     <div class="js-show-more-placeholder"></div>

        <path d="M8.2 0h1.6l.4 7.8 7.8.4v1.6l-7.8.4-.4 7.8H8.2l-.4-7.8L0 9.8V8.2l7.8-.4.4-7.8z" /> 
       </svg> </span> <span class="inline-minus inline-icon "> 
       <svg width="32" height="32" viewbox="0 0 32 32" class="inline-minus__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
        <path d="M5 15h22v3H5z" />

    </div>

   <div class="fc-container__inner"> 
    <header class="fc-container__header

     <div class="fc-container__header__title"> 
      <a data-link-name="section heading" href="https://www.theguardian.com/business/cost-of-living-crisis"> <h2 id="container-header-24386d36-8ab5-419b-b209-aae20897f1e2" class="fc-container__title__text">Cost of living crisis</h2> </a> 
     </div> 
    </header> 
    <div class="fc-container--rolled-up-hide fc-container__body" data-title="Cost of living crisis" data-id="24386d36-8ab5-419b-b209-aae20897f1e2" id="container-24386d36-8ab5-419b-b209-aae20897f1e2"> 
     <div class="fc-slice-wrapper"> 
      <ul class="u-unstyled l-row  l-row--cols-4 fc-slice fc-slice--q-q-q-q"> 
       <li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link"> 
        <div class="fc-item fc-item--has-image fc-item--pillar-news fc-item--type-article js-fc-item fc-item--list-media-mobile fc-item--standard-tablet js-snappable" data-link-name="news | group-0 | card-@1" data-item-visibility="all" data-test-id="facia-card" data-id="education/2022/nov/23/nine-in-10-students-in-england-worried-about-cost-of-living-survey-finds" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/mmhfv"> 
         <div class="fc-item__container"> 
          <div class="fc-item__media-wrapper"> 
           <div class="fc-item__image-container u-responsive-ratio "> 
            <picture> 
             <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]--> 
             <source media="(min-width: 980px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.25), (min-width: 980px) and (min-resolution: 120dpi)" sizes="220px" srcset="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/85711ea1e45753b7fce6ca3bf4f90eb2cdde0dad/0_224_6720_4032/master/6720.jpg?width=220&amp;quality=45&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;dpr=2&amp;s=994918548c5f596a77ee81823672efd1 440w"> 
             <source media="(min-width: 980px)" sizes="220px" srcset="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/85711ea1e45753b7fce6ca3bf4f90eb2cdde0dad/0_224_6720_4032/master/6720.jpg?width=220&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=682dcb54742b5442590ce9e750bb2fa6 220w">

  <section id="video" class="fc-container fc-container--lazy-load fc-container--video fc-container--will-have-toggle js-container--lazy-load js-container--toggle " data-link-name="container-17 | video" data-id="5befafa5-607e-44cd-80ab-ff5ecede0891" data-component="video" aria-expanded="true"> 
   <div class="gs-container"> 
    <div class="fc-container__inner"> 
     <header class="fc-container__header js-container__header"> 
      <h2 class="video-title fc-container__header__title"> <a href="video" data-link-name="video-container-title Video">Video</a> </h2> 
     </header> 
    </div> 
    <div class="video-playlist video-playlist--start js-video-playlist fc-container--rolled-up-hide" data-number-of-videos="7" data-component="video-playlist"> 
     <a class="video-playlist__control video-playlist__control--prev js-video-playlist-prev" data-link-name="video-container-prev" role="button" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true" aria-label="show previous video"> <span class="inline-chevron-left inline-icon video-playlist__icon">

       </svg> </span> </a> 
     <ul class="u-unstyled video-playlist__inner js-video-playlist-inner "> 
      <li class="video-playlist__item video-title video-title--leftcol fc-container__header__title"> 
       <ul class="treats__container"> 
        <li class="treats__list-item"> <a href="/documentaries" data-link-name="treat | 1 | Documentaries" class="treats__treat">Documentaries</a> </li> 
       </ul> </li> 
      <li class="video-playlist__item js-video-playlist-item-0 video-playlist__item--active video-playlist__item--first fc-item--pillar-lifestyle "> 
       <div data-media-atom-id="73841c3e-868e-4314-af31-25ee7becebc8" class="u-responsive-ratio u-responsive-ratio--hd youtube-media-atom youtube-related-videos" data-channel-id="UCHpw8xwDNhU9gdohEcJu4aA"> 
        <div id="youtube-nHewjEw2fAI-67beb1ae-4780-466b-aaf2-bd5aee9394cf" data-asset-id="nHewjEw2fAI" class="youtube-media-atom__iframe"></div> 
        <div class="video-overlay">

     <div class="fc-container__header__title"> 
      <a data-link-name="section heading" href="https://www.theguardian.com/uk/culture"> <h2 id="container-header-ae511a89-ef38-4ec9-aab1-3a5ebc96d118" class="fc-container__title__text">Culture</h2> </a> 
     </div> 
    </header> 
    <div class="fc-container--rolled-up-hide fc-container__body fc-show-more--hidden js-container--fc-show-more" data-title="Culture" data-id="ae511a89-ef38-4ec9-aab1-3a5ebc96d118" id="container-ae511a89-ef38-4ec9-aab1-3a5ebc96d118">

            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/games/2022/nov/23/pushing-buttons-nintendo-shigeru-miyamoto-super-mario-zelda-video-games" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Nintendo’s Shigeru Miyamoto</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">What we owe the world’s most influential game designer</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div>

            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">

          <div class="fc-item__content fc-item__content--has-stars"> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/film/2022/nov/23/glass-onion-a-knives-out-mystery-review-daniel-craig-shakes-and-stirs-up-the-party" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery review</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Daniel Craig’s drawling detective is back</span></span> </a></h3> 
            <span class="u-h">4 out of 5 stars.</span> 
            <div class="stars fc-item__stars" aria-hidden="true"> 
             <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden"> 
              <svg width="14" height="13" viewbox="0 0 14 13" class="star__item__svg star__item--golden__svg inline-star__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
               <path d="M0 5.2 3.7 8l-1.4 4.6.5.4 3.7-2.8 3.7 2.8.5-.4L9.3 8 13 5.2l-.2-.6H8.2L6.8 0h-.6L4.8 4.6H.2l-.2.6z" />

             <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden">

               <path d="M0 5.2 3.7 8l-1.4 4.6.5.4 3.7-2.8 3.7 2.8.5-.4L9.3 8 13 5.2l-.2-.6H8.2L6.8 0h-.6L4.8 4.6H.2l-.2.6z" /> 
              </svg> </span> 
             <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden">

              </svg> </span> 
             <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--golden"> 
              <svg width="14" height="13" viewbox="0 0 14 13" class="star__item__svg star__item--golden__svg inline-star__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
               <path d="M0 5.2 3.7 8l-1.4 4.6.5.4 3.7-2.8 3.7 2.8.5-.4L9.3 8 13 5.2l-.2-.6H8.2L6.8 0h-.6L4.8 4.6H.2l-.2.6z" /> 
              </svg> </span> 
             <span class="inline-star inline-icon star__item star__item--grey"> 
              <svg width="14" height="13" viewbox="0 0 14 13" class="star__item__svg star__item--grey__svg inline-star__svg inline-icon__svg">

              </svg> </span> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             Benoit Blanc returns, with a cast of A-listers from Edward Norton to Janelle Monáe, in Rian Johnson’s ingenious new whodunnit romp
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div>

              <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/music/2022/nov/23/holly-humberstone-review-brit-winner-makes-a-big-room-feel-intimate" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Holly Humberstone review</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Brit winner makes a big room feel intimate</span></span> </a></h3>

          <!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]--> 
          <img loading="auto" class="advert__image" alt="" src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/fc54c04c1a85c0ead7dc4806a8a71ba70255d058/0_41_3200_1920/master/3200.jpg?width=300&amp;quality=85&amp;auto=format&amp;fit=max&amp;s=2252ccd12c9096f6172d697f2ee1b50d"> 
         </picture> 
        </div> 
        <div class="advert__standfirst
                hide-until-tablet
                ">
         Rice, from basmati to jasmine, has become a popular staple in many British cupboards, but are we cooking it right? We spoke to an expert to find out all the inside knowledge on rice
        </div> </a> 
       <div class="badge badge--branded">

          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header">

           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/sep/21/iranians-share-your-views-on-the-protests-following-mahsa-aminis-death" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Iran</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Iranians: share your views on the protests following Mahsa Amini’s death</span></span> </a></h3>

           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper">

          </div> 
          <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/sep/21/iranians-share-your-views-on-the-protests-following-mahsa-aminis-death" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">Iranians: share your views on the protests following Mahsa Amini’s death</a>

          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2022/nov/23/manchester-united-club-up-for-sale-glazer-family-old-trafford" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Football</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">Manchester United fans, how do you feel about the club being put up for sale?</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             We would like to hear from fans around the world after the Glazer family announced plans to leave Old Trafford
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2022/nov/23/manchester-united-club-up-for-sale-glazer-family-old-trafford" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">Manchester United fans, how do you feel about the club being put up for sale?</a> 
         </div> 
        </div> </li> 
       <li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-1 u-faux-block-link"> 
        <div class="fc-item fc-item--has-image fc-item--pillar-lifestyle fc-item--type-article js-fc-item fc-item--list-media-mobile fc-item--standard-tablet js-snappable" data-link-name="news | group-0 | card-@3" data-item-visibility="all" data-test-id="facia-card" data-id="money/2022/nov/22/people-in-the-uk-tell-us-why-you-are-unable-to-work-despite-wanting-to" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/mmc55">

          </div> 
          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/money/2022/nov/22/people-in-the-uk-tell-us-why-you-are-unable-to-work-despite-wanting-to" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Work &amp; careers</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">People in the UK: tell us why you are unable to work despite wanting to</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             We’d like to find out the reasons that prevent people in the UK from working as much as they’d like – whether it’s childcare, health issues, housing or travel

            </div> 
           </div>

          </div> 
          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2022/nov/23/velcro-bullet-trains-and-robotic-arms-nature-mother-of-invention-aoe" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Velcro, bullet trains and robotic arms</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">How nature is the mother of invention</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
             Many of the world’s most inspiring solutions have been created by scientists who stole their ideas from the natural world
            </div> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta js-item__meta"> 
            </div> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
          <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2022/nov/23/velcro-bullet-trains-and-robotic-arms-nature-mother-of-invention-aoe" class="u-faux-block-link__overlay js-headline-text" data-link-name="article" tabindex="-1" aria-hidden="true">How nature is the mother of invention</a> 
         </div> 
        </div> </li>

     <div class="fc-container__header__title"> 
      <a data-link-name="section heading" href="https://www.theguardian.com/inpictures"> <h2 id="container-header-dbd693a3-3b92-4e4f-ae1f-9dca8d8c4915" class="fc-container__title__text">In pictures</h2> </a>

    <div class="fc-container--rolled-up-hide fc-container__body" data-title="In pictures" data-id="dbd693a3-3b92-4e4f-ae1f-9dca8d8c4915" id="container-dbd693a3-3b92-4e4f-ae1f-9dca8d8c4915"> 
     <div class="fc-slice-wrapper"> 
      <ul class="u-unstyled l-row  l-row--cols-4 fc-slice fc-slice--qqq-q"> 
       <li class="fc-slice__item l-row__item l-row__item--span-3 u-faux-block-link"> 
        <div class="fc-item fc-item--gallery fc-item--has-image fc-item--is-media-link fc-item--pillar-arts fc-item--type-media js-fc-item fc-item--standard-mobile fc-item--three-quarters-tablet js-snappable" data-link-name="media | group-0 | card-@1" data-item-visibility="all" data-test-id="facia-card" data-id="artanddesign/gallery/2022/nov/23/kings-of-the-underground-the-last-coal-miners-of-wales" data-loyalty-short-url="/p/mk9zj">

            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/artanddesign/gallery/2022/nov/23/kings-of-the-underground-the-last-coal-miners-of-wales" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Kings of the underground</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">The last coal miners of Wales</span></span> </a></h3>

           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/artanddesign/gallery/2022/nov/23/fashion-fine-art-and-hitler-the-turbulent-career-of-erwin-blumenfeld-in-pictures" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Fashion, fine art … and Hitler</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">The turbulent career of Erwin Blumenfeld </span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
            His fashion career was disrupted by the second world war, but that didn’t stop the Jewish photographer from sneaking fine art into his later work

          <div class="fc-item__content "> 
           <div class="fc-item__header"> 
            <h3 class="fc-item__title"><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/artanddesign/gallery/2022/nov/22/cars-bars-and-burger-joints-william-egglestons-iconic-america-in-pictures" class="fc-item__link" data-link-name="article"><span class="fc-item__kicker">Cars, bars and burger joints</span> <span class="u-faux-block-link__cta fc-item__headline"> <span class="js-headline-text">William Eggleston’s iconic America</span></span> </a></h3> 
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__standfirst">
            The landmark series Outlands created a new visual language of gas stations, diners and signage that inspired a generation of photographers
           </div> 
           <div class="fc-item__footer-meta-wrapper"> 
            <div class="fc-item__meta-wrapper"> 
             <div class="fc-item__media-meta"> 
              <span class="inline-camera inline-icon "> 
               <svg width="18" height="13" viewbox="0 0 18 13" class="inline-camera__svg inline-icon__svg"> 
                <path d="M18 3.5v8L16.5 13h-15L0 11.5v-8L1.5 2H5l2-2h4l2 2h3.5L18 3.5zM9 11c1.9 0 3.5-1.6 3.5-3.5S10.9 4 9 4 5.5 5.6 5.5 7.5 7.1 11 9 11z" /> 
               </svg> </span>

<div class="site-message-overlay js-site-message-overlay is-hidden" data-link-name="release message : overlay"></div>
<div class="site-message js-site-message is-hidden" tabindex="-1" data-link-name="release message" role="dialog" aria-label="welcome" aria-describedby="site-message__message" aria-live="polite" >
    <div class="gs-container">
        <div class="site-message__inner js-site-message-inner">
            <div class="site-message__roundel">
                

<span  class="inline-marque-36 inline-icon u-vertical-align-middle-icon" >
    
        <svg width="36" height="36" viewbox="0 0 36 36" class="u-vertical-align-middle-icon__svg inline-marque-36__svg inline-icon__svg">
 <path d="M18 0a18 18 0 1 0 0 36 18 18 0 0 0 0-36" />
 <path fill="#FFF" d="M21.2 4.4c2.3.4 5.3 2 6.3 3.1v5.2H27L21.2 5v-.6zm-2.2.4c-4 0-6.3 5.6-6.3 13.2 0 7.7 2.2 13.3 6.3 13.3v.6c-6 .4-14.4-4.2-14-13.8A13.3 13.3 0 0 1 19 4v.7zm10.4 14.4-1.9.9v8.6c-1 1-3.8 2.6-6.3 3.1V19.9l-2.2-.7v-.6h10.4v.6z" />

                    <span class="u-h">Close</span>

<script>
// non-blocking JS to improve the perceived rendering speed
try{(function(isVeryModern,document,window){if(isVeryModern){var decodeBase64=function(str){return decodeURIComponent(atob(str.replace(/-/g,"+").replace(/_/g,"/").replace(/,/g,"\x3d")))};var cookieData=function(a){var d=[],e=document.cookie.split(";");a=RegExp("^\\s*"+a+"\x3d\\s*(.*?)\\s*$");for(var b=0;b<e.length;b++){var f=e[b].match(a);f&&d.push(f[1])}if(d.length>0)return d[0];return null}("GU_U");var userData=cookieData?JSON.parse(decodeBase64(cookieData.split(".")[0])):null;if(userData){var displayName=
decodeURIComponent(userData[2]);window.guardian.config.user={id:userData[0],displayName:displayName,accountCreatedDate:userData[6],emailVerified:userData[7],rawResponse:cookieData}}}})(guardian.isEnhanced&&"atob"in window,document,window)}catch(e){};


    // Insert username in top bar on page load
    try{(function(isVeryModern,document,window){var user=window.guardian.config.user;if(isVeryModern&&user)window.requestAnimationFrame(function(){var $profileInfoElem=document.getElementsByClassName("js-profile-info")[0];var $profileNavElem=document.getElementsByClassName("js-profile-nav")[0];if(!$profileInfoElem&&!$profileNavElem)return;$profileInfoElem.innerHTML=user.displayName;$profileNavElem.classList.add("is-signed-in");var $signInLinkElem=$profileNavElem.getElementsByTagName("a")[0];if($signInLinkElem)if(user.id)$signInLinkElem.addEventListener("click",
function(e){e.preventDefault()});else $signInLinkElem.setAttribute("href",$signInLinkElem.getAttribute("href").replace("signin","public/edit/"));var $register=document.getElementsByClassName("js-profile-register");if($register.length){$register=$register[0];$register.parentElement.removeChild($register)}})})("classList"in document.documentElement,document,window)}catch(e){};


// ************* ANALYTICS *************

// Ophan pageview ID and browser ID are needed by Google Analytics, which runs just after this script tag
(function(window,document){function getCookieValue(name){var nameEq=name+"\x3d",cookies=document.cookie.split(";"),value=null;cookies.forEach(function(cookie){while(cookie.charAt(0)===" ")cookie=cookie.substring(1,cookie.length);if(cookie.indexOf(nameEq)===0)value=cookie.substring(nameEq.length,cookie.length)});return value}window.guardian.config.ophan.browserId=getCookieValue("bwid")})(window,document);


</script>


    


    

    

<script id='google_analytics'>


    var pillar = 'News';


// This is to prevent console errors from code calling window.ga for sessions where we have not loaded the tracking script
// (where the user has not given their consent for GA tracking)
window.ga = function() {};

window.guardian.googleAnalytics.initialiseGa = function() {
    // Remove spaces from content type and convert it to lower case
    function convertContentType(contentType) {
        var result = contentType;
        if (typeof contentType === 'string') {
            result = contentType.toLowerCase().split(' ').join('');
        }
        return result;
    }

    function getQueryParam(key) {
        var query = window.location.search.substring(1);
        var vars = query.split("&");
        var pairs = vars.map(function(x) { return x.split('=')});
        return pairs.filter(function(xs) { return xs.length == 2 && xs[0] == key })
            .map(function(xs) { return xs[1] })[0];
    }

    function getAnalyticsEdition() {
        var edition = (guardian.config.page.edition || '').toLowerCase()
        return edition === 'int' ? 'international' : edition;
    }

    function getAnalyticsTitle() {
        var analyticsTitle = (guardian.config.page.webTitle || '');
        return (analyticsTitle === 'Network Front') ? getAnalyticsEdition() + ' network front' : analyticsTitle;
    }

    // Please email Dotcom Platform before changing this value
    function getExperienceValue() {
        // return 'none' if you're not testing anything
        if (guardian.config.page.dcrCouldRender) {
            return 'dcrCouldRender';
        } else {
            return 'none';
        }
    }

    var identityId = null;
    if (guardian.config.user) {
        identityId = guardian.config.user.id;
    }
    var isLoggedIn = (!!identityId).toString();

    // If we have stubbed window.ga = function() {};, remove the stub before Google attempts
    // to initialise it properly (it will not get initialised if the stub already exists)
    delete window.ga;
    
    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
            (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
        m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
    })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

    
    window.guardian.config.page.gaIsInitalised = true;
    
        ga('create', 'UA-78705427-1', 'auto', 'allEditorialPropertyTracker', {
            'sampleRate': 100,
            'siteSpeedSampleRate': 0.1
        });
    
        ga('create', 'UA-33592456-1', 'auto', 'guardianTestPropertyTracker', {
            'sampleRate': 5,
            'siteSpeedSampleRate': 0.1
        });
    

    
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'forceSSL', true);

        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'title', getAnalyticsTitle());

        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'anonymizeIp', true);

        
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension3', 'theguardian.com'); 

        
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension4', guardian.config.page.section);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension5', convertContentType(guardian.config.page.contentType));
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension6', guardian.config.page.commissioningDesks);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension7', guardian.config.page.contentId);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension8', guardian.config.page.authorIds);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension9', guardian.config.page.keywordIds);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension10', guardian.config.page.toneIds);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension11', guardian.config.page.seriesId);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension16', isLoggedIn);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension21', getQueryParam('INTCMP')); 
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension22', getQueryParam('CMP_BUNIT')); 
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension23', getQueryParam('CMP_TU')); 
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension26', (!!guardian.config.page.isHosted).toString());
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension27', navigator.userAgent);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension29', window.location.href);
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension30', getAnalyticsEdition());
        
          ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension31', 'mailchimp|atg productions|tilda|henkel');
        
        
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension43', getExperienceValue()); 
        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension50', pillar);

        if(document.location.hash === '#fbLogin') {
            ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.set', 'referrer', null);
            document.location.hash = '';
        }

    
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'forceSSL', true);

        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'title', getAnalyticsTitle());

        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'anonymizeIp', true);

        
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension3', 'theguardian.com'); 

        
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension4', guardian.config.page.section);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension5', convertContentType(guardian.config.page.contentType));
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension6', guardian.config.page.commissioningDesks);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension7', guardian.config.page.contentId);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension8', guardian.config.page.authorIds);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension9', guardian.config.page.keywordIds);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension10', guardian.config.page.toneIds);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension11', guardian.config.page.seriesId);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension16', isLoggedIn);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension21', getQueryParam('INTCMP')); 
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension22', getQueryParam('CMP_BUNIT')); 
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension23', getQueryParam('CMP_TU')); 
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension26', (!!guardian.config.page.isHosted).toString());
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension27', navigator.userAgent);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension29', window.location.href);
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension30', getAnalyticsEdition());
        
          ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension31', 'mailchimp|atg productions|tilda|henkel');
        
        
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension43', getExperienceValue()); 
        ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'dimension50', pillar);

        if(document.location.hash === '#fbLogin') {
            ga('guardianTestPropertyTracker.set', 'referrer', null);
            document.location.hash = '';
        }

    

    

        ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.send', 'pageview');

        

        try {
            var NG_STORAGE_KEY = 'gu.analytics.referrerVars';
            var referrerVarsData = window.sessionStorage.getItem(NG_STORAGE_KEY);
            var referrerVars = JSON.parse(referrerVarsData);
            if (referrerVars && referrerVars.value) {
                var d = new Date().getTime();
                if (d - referrerVars.value.time < 60 * 1000) { // One minute
                    ga('allEditorialPropertyTracker.send', 'event', 'Click', 'Internal', referrerVars.value.tag, {
                        nonInteraction: true, // to avoid affecting bounce rate
                        dimension12: referrerVars.value.path
                    });
                }
                window.sessionStorage.removeItem(NG_STORAGE_KEY);
            }
        } catch (e) { }

    

    // Mediator will be intialised if we need to use this, otherwise just use GA straight away
    guardian.app && guardian.app.mediator && guardian.app.mediator.emit('modules:ga:ready');

};
</script>




</body>


    



</html>
